trans-unit.source: Provides command related utility methods that register <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> objects for class owners and commands, add and remove command event handlers, and provides services for querying the status of a command.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os métodos de utilitário relativos ao comando que registram objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> para proprietários de classe e comandos, adiciona e remove manipuladores de eventos de comando e fornece serviços para consultar o status de um comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> is responsible for managing routed commands.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> é responsável por gerenciar comandos roteados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comandos, consulte [visão geral do comando](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> to register a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> para registrar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> a uma classe em vez de uma instância.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> to register an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> para registrar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> a uma classe em vez de uma instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method forces the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> método força a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event informs a command source to query the command it is associated with to determine whether or not the command can execute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento informa uma fonte de comando para consultar o comando está associado para determinar se o comando pode executar.

trans-unit.source: The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
trans-unit.target: O elemento ao qual anexar <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The can execute handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador can execute.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> e anexa-os para uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que é uma origem de comando para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is created and associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> é criado e associado a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> are created.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> são criados.

trans-unit.source: And finally, the handlers are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: E por fim, os manipuladores anexados para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> ou <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
trans-unit.target: O elemento ao qual anexar <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The executed handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador executado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.target: Por fim, os manipuladores anexados para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> ou <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
trans-unit.target: O elemento ao qual anexar <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The can execute handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador can execute.

trans-unit.target: Anexa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> e anexa-os para uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que é uma origem de comando para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is created and associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> é criado e associado a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> are created.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> são criados.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the handlers are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, os manipuladores anexados para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> ou <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute" /> anexado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> anexado.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Força o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> a gerar o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> only pays attention to certain conditions in determining when the command target has changed, such as change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> só pagará atenção para determinadas condições para determinar quando o destino do comando foi alterado, como alteração de em foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: In situations where the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> does not sufficiently determine a change in conditions that cause a command to not be able to execute, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> can be called to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: Em situações em que o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> suficientemente não determina uma alteração nas condições que causam um comando para não ser capaz de executar, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> pode ser chamado para forçar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> to periodically call <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> periodicamente chamar <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> para forçar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute" /> anexado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" /> anexado.

trans-unit.source: The class with which to register <c>commandBinding</c>.
trans-unit.target: A classe com a qual registrar <c>commandBinding</c>.

trans-unit.source: The command binding to register.
trans-unit.target: A associação do comando a ser registrado.

trans-unit.source: Registers a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Registra um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> com o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enables a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to be associated with a class instead than an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> a ser associado uma classe de uma instância de uma classe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="commandBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> ou <paramref name="commandBinding" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The type to register <c>inputBinding</c> with.
trans-unit.target: O tipo com o qual registrar <c>inputBinding</c>.

trans-unit.source: The input binding to register.
trans-unit.target: A associação de entrada a ser registrada.

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Registra o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> especificado com o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enables an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to be associated with a type instead of an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que um <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> a ser associado um tipo em vez de uma instância de uma classe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="inputBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> ou <paramref name="inputBinding" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual remover <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The can execute handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador can execute.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Desanexa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir desanexa um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que anteriormente tinha foi anexado a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> ou <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual remover <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The executed handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador executado.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Desanexa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> ou <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual remover <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The can execute handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador can execute.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Desanexa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir desanexa um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que anteriormente tinha foi anexado a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> ou <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual remover <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The executed handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador executado.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Desanexa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir desanexa um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que anteriormente tinha foi anexado a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> ou <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> detects conditions that might change the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> detecta condições que podem alterar a capacidade de execução de um comando.

trans-unit.source: This event holds onto the handler as a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento mantiver o manipulador como uma referência fraca.

trans-unit.source: Objects that listen for this event should keep a strong reference to their event handler to avoid it being garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que escutam para esse evento devem manter uma referência forte para o manipulador de eventos para evitar que ele está sendo coletado como lixo.

trans-unit.source: This can be accomplished by having a private field and assigning the handler as the value before or after attaching to this event.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ser feito com um campo particular e atribuindo o manipulador como o valor, antes ou depois de anexar a este evento.
